import_promethion
=================

Description
-----------

This function imports Sable Systems Prometion indirect calorimetry data
sets

Usage
-----

.. code:: r

   import_promethion(file, file_out)

Arguments
---------

-  ``file``: input file
-  ``file_out``: output file

Examples
--------

.. code:: r

   import_promethion(input_file, output_file)
